Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.spring

Class Summary
BaseSingletonFactoryBean<T> Base FactoryBean for creating singletons
CustomApplicationContext Custom application context used to set the allowRawInjectionDespiteWrapping property
CustomSessionFactoryBean Custom session factory bean used to setup Hibernate
CustomWebApplicationContext Custom web application context used to set the allowRawInjectionDespiteWrapping property on the BeanFactory.
CyclosConfigurationFactoryBean A factory bean which returns the cyclos configuration properties
FactoryBeanFromProperties<T> A FactoryBean which looks up a class name in cyclos.properties and has a default implementation
SecurityProxyPostProcessor BeanPostProcessor which wraps security services in proxies, used to store exceptions, which could be suppressed, but would still need to be processed
ServiceSecurityProxyInvocationHandler Invocation handler for service security proxies
